items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product suggestions on product detail and homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on user's recent interactions within 5 minutes.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
System supports personalized recommendations for at least 1 million active users without performance degradation.
non_functional: Recommendation response time under 200ms per request
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already exists and the requirement is to add AI-powered recommendations. No details provided on specific algorithms or data sources, so assumptions made about personalization and performance.
